Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Documentary papyrus of the same type of accountancy as that on the fragment of P. Lille 62 (a) verso, with often considerable sums in talents, drachmas and submultiples and with the same points only above certain totals (attesting to inspection by revisers). One detail though, as the four last lines contain quantified results: total bars followed by amounts on the scale of hundreds and thousands of talents.
